project.description:
Copy build output raw files to \\filer.caw.com\home\qabuild\TestCenter\2.00\engineering_builds\GUI_BLL as per request from Nicolas
NOTE: This job must be setup to run on the same machine as the Windows

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
set BRANCH_ID=6 rem -- set FILER_DIR=L:TestCenter\2.00\engineering_builds\GUI_BLL\%STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%.%BLL_BUILD_NUMBER%%BRANCH_ID% rem -- echo "Copying raw files from %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release to %FILER_DIR% ..." rem -- mkdir %FILER_DIR% rem -- xcopy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\Model %FILER_DIR%\Model /e /i /y rem -- xcopy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\PDUs %FILER_DIR%\PDUs /e /i /y rem -- xcopy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\RcmDb %FILER_DIR%\RcmDb /e /i /y rem -- xcopy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\Resources %FILER_DIR%\Resources /e /i /y rem -- xcopy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\stclib %FILER_DIR%\ stclib /e /i /y rem -- xcopy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\Templates %FILER_DIR%\Templates /e /i /y rem -- xcopy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\Tcl %FILER_DIR%\Tcl /e /i /y rem -- xcopy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\Python %FILER_DIR%\Python /e /i /y rem -- xcopy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\STAKCommands %FILER_DIR%\STAKCommands /e /i /y rem -- copy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\*.* %FILER_DIR% /y
net use K: /delete net use K: \\10.40.52.42\home\qabuild Spirent8 /USER:SPIRENTCOM\qabuild set FILER_DIR=K:\TestCenter\2.00\engineering_builds\GUI_BLL\%STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%.%BLL_BUILD_NUMBER%%BRANCH_ID% echo "Copying raw files from %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release to %FILER_DIR% ..." mkdir %FILER_DIR% xcopy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\Model %FILER_DIR%\Model /e /i /y xcopy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\PDUs %FILER_DIR%\PDUs /e /i /y xcopy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\RcmDb %FILER_DIR%\RcmDb /e /i /y xcopy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\Resources %FILER_DIR%\Resources /e /i /y xcopy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\stclib %FILER_DIR%\ stclib /e /i /y xcopy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\Templates %FILER_DIR%\Templates /e /i /y xcopy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\Tcl %FILER_DIR%\Tcl /e /i /y xcopy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\Python %FILER_DIR%\Python /e /i /y xcopy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\STAKCommands %FILER_DIR%\STAKCommands /e /i /y copy %BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR%\bin\Release\*.* %FILER_DIR% /y
